response_requirements.initial_response_description: Must allow inspection/copying, notify if not in custody with location, provide estimate if available within 30 days, or cite specific denial authority
response_requirements.final_response_notes: If available within 30 days, must provide reasonable estimate
response_requirements.extension_notes: Automatic deemed denial if no response within 5 business days

fee_structure.search_fee_notes: No separate search fee provision in statute
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Cannot exceed actual cost to governmental entity
fee_structure.fee_waiver_criteria: Governmental entity may adopt policy to waive fees

exemptions.description: Records made confidential by other statutes - must be strictly and narrowly construed

appeal_process.first_level_notes: Direct appeal to district court in county where record is located - court must prioritize proceedings
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court may award costs and reasonable attorney's fees if requester prevails

requester_requirements.identification_notes: No identification requirements specified in statute
requester_requirements.reason_notes: No requirement to state purpose for request

agency_obligations.response_options: Allow inspection/copying, notify if not in custody, provide estimate if delayed, or cite denial authority
agency_obligations.denial_requirements: Must cite specific statute that authorizes denial
agency_obligations.fee_estimate_notes: Must post fee schedule conspicuously but no estimate requirement

validation_metadata.notes: Strong democratic principles foundation; strict narrow construction of confidentiality exemptions; burden of proof on government to prove confidentiality
